Package index

Catalogs

Tools for working with BdE catalogs.

bde_catalog_load()
Load BdE catalogs
bde_catalog_search()
Search BdE catalogs
bde_catalog_update()
Update BdE catalogs

Series

Tools for working with BdE series.

bde_series_full_load()
Load BdE full time-series files
bde_series_load()
Load a single BdE time-series

BdE Indicators

Selected macroeconomic indicators of Spain.

bde_ind_gdp_var() bde_ind_unemployment_rate() bde_ind_euribor_12m_monthly() bde_ind_euribor_12m_daily() bde_ind_cpi_var() bde_ind_ibex_monthly() bde_ind_ibex_daily() bde_ind_gdp_quarterly() bde_ind_population()
Relevant Indicators of Spain
bde_ind_db
Database of selected macroeconomic indicators

Plot utils

Complementary functions for plotting with ggplot2.

bde_tidy_palettes()
BdE color palettes
scale_color_bde_d() scale_fill_bde_d() scale_color_bde_c() scale_fill_bde_c()
BdE scales for ggplot2
theme_tidybde()
BdE ggplot2 theme

Utils

bde_parse_dates()
Parse dates

About the package

tidyBdE tidyBdE-package
tidyBdE: Download Data from Bank of Spain

On this page

About tidyBdE

Developed by Diego H. Herrero.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.

Template rostemplate by dieghernan, based on bootstraptemple.com.
